doc:
Robert Easton (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Easton_(actor) 0 Robert Easton (born Robert Easton Burke, November 23, 1930 – December 16, 2011) was an American radio, film, and television actor whose career spanned more than 60 years. His mastery of English dialect earned him the epithet "The Man of a Thousand Voices". For decades, he was a leading Hollywood dialogue or accent coach. Robert_Easton ( born Robert_Easton_Burke , November_23_,_1930 – December_16_,_2011 ) was an_American_radio , film , and television_actor whose_career spanned more_than_60_years . His_mastery of English_dialect earned him the_epithet " The_Man of a_Thousand_Voices " . For decades , he was a_leading_Hollywood_dialogue_or_accent_coach .
